name: io.github.pubnub/mcp-server
title: PubNub MCP Server
description: PubNub Model Context Protocol MCP Server for Cursor and Claude

environmentVariables.name: PUBNUB_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Your PubNub API Key. Required for all operations related to your account/keyset

environmentVariables.name: PUBNUB_PUBLISH_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional PubNub publish key for real-time operations

environmentVariables.name: PUBNUB_SUBSCRIBE_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional PubNub subscribe key for real-time operations

environmentVariables.name: PUBNUB_USER_ID
environmentVariables.description: Optional variable that can be provided to change the User ID for the SDK (real-time) operations (default: pubnub-mcp)

environmentVariables.name: PUBNUB_EMAIL
environmentVariables.description: (Deprecated - use API Key instead) Your PubNub account email. Required for all operations related to your account/keyset

environmentVariables.name: PUBNUB_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: (Deprecated - use API Key instead) Your PubNub account password. Required for all operations related to your account/keyset
